articles.title: Kgothatso Montjane edges Japan's Momoko Ohtani to reach maiden Wimbledon final - IOL
articles.description: South African wheelchair tennis star Kgothatso Montjane beat Japan’s Momoko Ohtani to reach her first ever Wimbledon final on Friday.
articles.content:
LONDON South African wheelchair tennis star, Kgothatso Montjane, ousted Momoko Ohtani 7-6(3), 4-6, 6-4 to reach her first Wimbledon final, at the All England Lawn Tennis Club, in London, on Friday.
